comment: VagaroPro makes scheduling easy! Before this app I was going back and forth with clients via text to find a time that works for both of us. This app is so convenient for the fact that the client can find the time and day that works for both of us without me spending my time tying to accommodate their schedule. It's a lifesaver! I have shaved a few hours off my work hours by using VagaroPro. Also, I am able to make notes on each client and keep track of inventory. I do spray tans so I am able to track the colors I use and notate which ones are their favorite. Definitely recommend this app!

author: LaLah Humble
comment: For the past 4 years I've been using MindBody & dropped them when they raised their rates from $25 to $125. Vagaro is sooooooo much better & easier to use for both me & my clients at a reasonable price.

author: Kindal McAuliffe
comment: I love this app. It has greatly simplified my scheduling process and so easy to use!

author: Amanda Boykin
comment: Love this app for my clients! It does everything from online booking to credit card processing to inventory  to emails to website design. Fantastic customer service too!

author: Katrina Anderson
comment: It has everything I need except waiting for the blue tooth card reader!  Easy to use, easy to do state taxes, and about to add my first employee!

author: F G
comment: As a self employed personal trainer, I find that this app provides everythi g I need to keep track of clients, appts and find new business. Really happy.

author: Amanda Martinez
comment: This app is great to keep track of all my business info and my clients love how user friendly it is!

author: Iesha Watkins
comment: Love it

author: Traci Molina
comment: I have an employee profile not an owners  so my abilities are not unlimited of coarse. But for personal use to keep my clients info or online booking it's super easy.  I do wish we could separate our clients into our own accounts. Currently, the owner and myself have one big list that you got to scroll thru or type in search bar. Good thing I trust her or all my clients info would be at risk.

author: Stephanie Gore
comment: I love this scheduling app. It's very easy to use. The only problem I have been having is some of my clients don't get the confirm texts that are supposed to be sent out.

author: Lauren Clepper
comment: Vagaro is finally making some awesome changes with the online prebook pahme ts and I heard new card readers soon thank goodness bc the old ones dont work with mt phone since I upgraded! Cant wait to see whats next!

author: Chadwick Cockhren
comment: Was perfect till I upgraded my phone. The draw to Vagaro from the other app I was using waa the swiper its more time efficient. I got the Note8 and my swiper doesn't work with it hope they fix it.

author: Rebecca Munoz
comment: So far so good! The tutorials are helpful in getting my business started. Getting the merchant acct soon and will update review after use.  Update: 2-2017 I absolutely love this program and app. The credit card processing is fast and deposited next day. Booking is so easy and clients love having the reminders and a way to check their appointments. Plus, if they have another tech with Vagaro, it puts it all in one place for them.

author: Cheyenne Gonnelly
comment: This app is exactly what I needed. I'm an independent stylist and I love that I can access my book anywhere anytime. My clients love that they can book online 24/7. I love that the program automatically sends appointment reminders.

author: Thursty Thurston
comment: This app is amazing compared to the old way of scheduling appointments in a book that was scribbled all over. I highly recommend this app!!

author: Dashiel Florez
comment: I enjoy this app. I'm an owner of DNA hair suite. A salon in Chelsea, NY and I love it for my coworkers. So we know how to manage our clients and time.

author: Ashley Evans
comment: I like this app it sends my clients messages about their appointments and I like how I can color code my services so I know at a glance what they are coming in for if they are new

author: Jessica Kroening
comment: updated and now it won't even allow you to log in

author: Jack Ridens
comment: Great app for keeping me immediately in the know about my clients appointments and last minute changes.

author: Elizabeth Brister
comment: This is absolutely a great app!!! The best thing that ever happened to my business.

author: Kaurtnei Meadows
comment: Way better than style seat not as expensive and have more features.
This app has kept me very organized...which came in real handy at tax time!

author: Mary KENNEDY
comment: This app is great for booking clients .. along with all salon business needs..

author: Amber Townsend
comment: Its been a great transition into my own business!

author: Joel Paulle
comment: Let's go try it first

author: Jeremy Gray
comment: I'm not paying $25 a month for an app!
I am really loving this app! My clients are too

author: Brandi Clipper
comment: My favorite!  Easy to use,  online  & in the app!  Would definitely recommend it!
So easy and cheap but delivers more than the competition

author: Darrin Johnson
comment: Great support team.

author: Sir Enigma
comment: I'm excited to see exactly what this product can do
Looking forward to maximize. My time is so valuable.

author: Selina Esparza
comment: Love it! Very easy to use!

author: Latifa Anderson
comment: I love the convenience.

author: Bathy Constant
comment: Love this app!

author: Ceceilia Williams
comment: User friendly

author: karen sanders
comment: Easy to use

author: Tracey Price
comment: Love it

author: Cindy Flores
comment: Love it

author: Tony Jelev
comment: Compafing to all other scheduling software Vagaro has an edge by providing free "book now"  integration with Yelp. There is some minor irritating things to be fixed like - Vagaro states that Credit card processing is same as Square but they charge you yearly Master Card fee that Square does not. Also there is room for improvement in "daily deal" section. Would love to see "last minute deal" option to be able to fill specicic spots on the fly for ur day. All in all it is a great tool and essential to my business as independent massage therapist.
